title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Analyze the principles of jet propulsion and develop a report on propulsion systems used in modern aircraft.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Conduct a detailed combustion analysis of various fuels and create a simulation model for efficient fuel burning.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design and optimize a nozzle for jet engines, focusing on performance improvements and energy efficiency.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: A multiple-choice quiz assessing the fundamentals of aerodynamics, covering both subsonic and supersonic flow conditions.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Perform an in-depth fluid flow analysis using computational methods, with an emphasis on laminar and turbulent flows.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Analyze the heat transfer in aerodynamic surfaces during flight and develop a thermal protection strategy for spacecraft re-entry.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design a structural component for a spacecraft, ensuring it can withstand the stresses of launch and space travel.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Calculate orbital parameters for a satellite mission, taking into account orbital decay and gravitational forces.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Final exam covering the principles of systems engineering, with a focus on integration, testing, and validation of aerospace systems.
